Text: Dysosmia is a disorder described as any qualitative alteration or distortion of the perception of smell.

<Text: Dysosmia:  Most cases are described as idiopathic and the main antecedents related to parosmia are URTIs, head trauma, and nasal and paranasal sinus disease.>
